author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ZetaDisplay: ProntoTV Signs Agreement With Leading Pharmacy Chain In Europe
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - ZETADISPLAY AB:
* ZETADISPLAY: PRONTOTV HAS SIGNED AN AGREEMENT WITH A LEADING PHARMACY CHAIN IN EUROPE
* AGREEMENT IS THREE YEARS WITH POSSIBILITY OF ONE-YEAR EXTENSION AND COVERING ALL COUNTRIES
* ‍AGREEMENT IS THREE YEARS WITH POSSIBILITY OF ONE-YEAR EXTENSION AND COVERING ALL COUNTRIES​
* FIRST TWO COUNTRIES, WHERE ROLLOUT WILL TAKE PLACE IN 2018, ARE TO SWEDEN AND NORWAY
* ‍ESTIMATES THAT VALUE OF AGREEMENT EXCEEDS APPROXIMATELY SEK 12 MILLION​
* ‍FIRST TWO COUNTRIES, WHERE ROLLOUT WILL TAKE PLACE IN 2018, ARE TO SWEDEN AND NORWAY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
